title: Intelligent Pipe Fabric
question: How can fugue evolve from a terminal multiplexer into a distributed intelligent stream processing fabric, replacing Unix pipes with remote-capable, agent-aware, observable data flows?
context: Unix pipes are the right abstraction but limited to local, synchronous, dumb byte streams. fugue already has primitives (panes, send_input/read_pane, orchestration, run_parallel/pipeline) that could enable distributed intelligent streaming. The vision is 'replace | with mux' - seamless pipe-pane usage as native remote compute.
constraints: Must feel as natural as Unix pipes
Must work with existing fugue primitives
Must support both agents and shell commands as targets
